pages.text: The $(item)Reinforced Chest Upgrade Kit/$ is a convenience which lets you upgrade any wooden chest to a $(l:machines/reinforced_chest)Reinforced Chest/$ in-place, keeping the chest's items. Just $(thing)Sneak-Right-click/$ the upgrade kit against any wooden chest to upgrade it.$(p)Note: You will get the $(item)wooden chest/$ you used the upgrade kit on back as an item drop.
Creating a Reinforced Chest Upgrade Kit.$(p)Note that the Reinforced Chest must be completely empty.
